nodes.text: Niv Lek was a human male who served as a pilot in the Resistance during its conflict with the First Order. He fought against the First Order during the assault on Starkiller Base piloting a T-70 X-wing starfighter.
Niv Lek was portrayed by James McArdle, in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens.
Lek's name spelled backwards is "Kelvin," the surname of J.J. Abrams' grandfather, which he frequently includes in his works.
